#

### Simple user management service that includes user register, validation, and password update. A volatile database was used for this application.

#

#### Routes:

- [GET] - "/users"
  - Lists all users
  - Requires token
- [POST] - "/users"
  - Register a user
- [POST] - "/login"
  - User login
- [PUT] - "/users/<uuid>"
  - User password update
